summary: This black and white movie is based on Rudyard Kipling's "Toomai, of the Elephants", in which a small native lad claims he knows the congregating place of the elephant hordes.
cast: Sabu|W.E. Holloway|Walter Hudd|Allan Jeayes|Bruce Gordon|D.J. Williams|Wilfrid Hyde-White|Iravatha|Harry Lane|Udham Singh
keywords: bare chested male|riding an elephant|elephant master|trained elephant|elephant trainer
director: Directors: Robert J. Flaherty (as Robert Flaherty), Zoltan Korda
title: Sabu-Toomai, el de los elefantes
